Articles.Content:
I found a way into the shadyverse and this is how I did it.

1. download ship. https://kerbalx.com/flyingraccoons2/the-kraken-summoner if this doesn't work, just go to kerbalx and look up: the kraken summoner

2. launch it! make sure you have all the cheats on or else it will explode. turn thees off. hack gravity, pause, biome, part clipping, and non strict on or else it will explode. you can take off the fairing if you want to. I recommend it. activate the 16 engines and activate SAS. If nothing happens, try pressing W, A, S, or D. If still nothing happens, then lift off.

3. you probably need to revert so it works. When the clump of nozzles and stuff expands a lot, it will probably happen. sometimes it doesn't. If you are propelled into space a insane speeds, you did it right. go into cockpit view and wait. Once everything goes away, your in the shadyverse! revert back to the KSC and it should have worked.

 

Enjoy!

Edited May 17, 2020 by Flyingraccoons
